entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 11:00 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
Temperature: -3.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: -4.3°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 9:20 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:20 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Flurries beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 9:20 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
